sentence.Network_en: I -- a benighted hoyden, already blossomed teenager of a knowledgeable.
sentence.Network_cn: 我 —— 一个愚昧无知的野丫头, 已长成一个有知识的少年.

sentence.Network_en: The man, free as a hoyden, ran to a chestnut tree and scratched back on bark.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个男人, 像个顽皮的姑娘一样任性, 跑到一棵栗子树下,在树皮上蹭着后背.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a rude or ignorant man): probably from Middle Dutch heiden (see heathen)

means.word_mean: 1. a girl who behaves in a boyish manner
